messages.message: <!here> I need to supply BAML on Monday with an answer to this on how they can move forward
you should check JIRA :slightly_smiling_face: — was asking when this needs to get done — we can get it done next week if this is super high pri
This is super high-priority from the UDF standpoint but overall from Instabase should have this as a turnkey

@Matt not sure exactly how/where to apply UDFs when source files have to be modified, but after futzing around with `xlrd` and `xlwt` realized that we also load `pandas` which makes this _realllllly_ simple: https://gist.github.com/pmn/07d8184cf172428d59b7f186c6c5c856
if you wanted to write new files you could do it with either pandas (also really simple), or xlrd + xlwt:
eh gross, i’ll just update the gist lmao
